articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: Europe win the Solheim Cup: Social media reaction to historic victory on American soil - Sky Sports
articles.description: Sir Nick Faldo, Lee Westwood and Jon Rahm were among the Ryder Cup players to pay tribute to Europe's Solheim Cup team after their impressive victory.
articles.content:
European captain Catriona Matthew said she was 'so proud' of her Solheim Cup team after Emily Pedersen sealed a 15-13 victory over the United States

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Covid-19 does not impair lung function in kids, adolescents - Sify News
articles.description: London, Sep 7 (IANS) Covid-19 infection does not appear to affect the lung function of young adults, according to new research presented at the European Respiratory Society International Congress on Tuesday.
articles.content: However, there was a trend towards slightly lower measurements for the amount of air they could exhale forcibly in one second, known as forced expiratory air volume in one second (FEV1), which is one… [+1979 chars]
